label: Courageous
description: Acts despite fear, enabling decisive moves when stakes are high. Pairs with warrior or rebel archetypes; counters internal doubt and can rehabilitate damaged reputations.

label: Compassionate
description: Feels and responds to others’ suffering. Supports caregiver/healer roles and can temper harsher motivations like revenge by reframing goals toward protection or mercy.

label: Loyal
description: Prioritizes commitments to people or causes. Interlocks with destiny (oaths imply sacrifice) and conflicts with occupations that require duplicity such as espionage.

label: Honest
description: Values truth even at cost. Creates friction with covert roles; builds durable reputations but invites external conflict with corrupt systems.

label: Patient
description: Tolerates delay and hardship without rash action. Synergizes with strategist or mentor roles; may clash with rescue‑driven, time‑critical plots.

label: Resourceful
description: Finds unconventional solutions under constraints. Enables underdogs and explorers; reframes external conflict as solvable puzzles.

label: Humble
description: Understates ability, inviting trust and learning. Counters hubris as a fatal flaw and strengthens mentor‑mentee dynamics.

label: Curious
description: Seeks knowledge and novelty. Fuels scholar/magician arcs; can conflict with secrets and spark plots by opening forbidden doors.

label: Empathetic
description: Reads and resonates with emotions. Bolsters diplomat/leader roles and helps bridge factional divides despite reputational baggage.

label: Resilient
description: Recovers from setbacks, sustaining motivation. Harmonizes with tragic backstories and helps outlast oppressive external forces.

label: Creative
description: Generates fresh ideas or aesthetics. Amplifies creator/artist roles; reframes conflict through expression and design.

label: Disciplined
description: Maintains focus and habits over time. Suits warrior/monk/engineer types; counterbalances impulsive teammates.

label: Generous
description: Shares resources and credit. Enhances caregiver/leader reputations and challenges scarcity‑driven motivations.

label: Diligent
description: Applies sustained care and effort. Supports precision roles (judge, engineer) and pays off in mastery arcs.

label: Adaptable
description: Shifts tactics when conditions change. Vital for explorers and spies; mitigates rigid fatal flaws.

label: Wise
description: Integrates knowledge with judgment. Powers mentor/sage roles; curbs rash motivations and avoids needless tragedy.

label: Brave
description: Faces danger head‑on, often physically. Frequently the tipping point in external set‑pieces when time is short.

label: Just
description: Balances competing claims impartially. Supports judge/ruler archetypes; collides with corrupt institutions and exposes secrets.

label: Optimistic
description: Expects good outcomes, sustaining morale. Useful in bleak settings but may blind to risks, fueling internal tension with pragmatism.

label: Strategic
description: Thinks in systems and horizons. Supports leader/strategist arcs and translates motivation into achievable plans.

label: Charismatic
description: Inspires followership through presence and speech. Amplifies leader/ruler destinies; can mask flaws or secrets.

label: Protective
description: Defends others instinctively. Powers guardian/healer arcs; escalates conflict when threats arise.

label: Determined
description: Refuses to quit, converting motivation into action. Can tip into obsession if unbalanced by humility or reflection.

label: Pragmatic
description: Chooses workable solutions over ideals. Harmonizes with engineer/merchant roles; clashes with zealotry.

label: Reflective
description: Thinks deeply about choices and consequences. Defuses impulsive traits and strengthens internal arcs.

label: Perceptive
description: Notices subtleties others miss. Core for detective/spy; exposes secrets and shifts reputations.

label: Tolerant
description: Accepts difference without prejudice. Stabilizes diverse teams and counteracts bigoted forces.

label: Gracious
description: Extends kindness in victory and loss. Softens reputational edges and supports healing after conflict.

label: Forgiving
description: Releases justified resentment. Resolves internal arcs and can avert tragedy by breaking revenge loops.

label: Open‑minded
description: Considers unfamiliar ideas fairly. Supports explorer/scholar roles and defuses culture‑clash conflicts.

label: Dependable
description: Can be counted on under pressure. Builds reputation capital and offsets chaos‑prone teammates.

label: Supportive
description: Elevates others’ performance. Enables mentor/leader dynamics and improves group outcomes.

label: Tenacious
description: Clings to goals doggedly. Great for underdogs; can ossify into obsession (a fatal flaw) when unchecked.

label: Altruistic
description: Sacrifices for others with minimal self‑interest. Pairs with hero/caregiver destinies; risks burnout.

label: Cooperative
description: Works smoothly in teams. Reduces friction and amplifies collective strategy under stress.

label: Decisive
description: Commits quickly with conviction. Crucial in crisis; can conflict with consensus‑driven cultures.

label: Meticulous
description: Sweats details others ignore. Valuable in judge/engineer/detective roles; risk of paralysis if overused.

label: Persuasive
description: Moves minds through argument or story. Key for diplomat/bard; ethically ambiguous when paired with dark aims.

label: Playful
description: Uses humor and spontaneity to energize. Complements jester/trickster archetypes; can defuse or inflame tension.

label: Innovative
description: Pushes boundaries to invent better ways. Pairs with creator/engineer; attracts resistance from tradition.

label: Integrity‑driven
description: Aligns action with values despite cost. Strengthens reputation and resolves internal dissonance.

label: Imaginative
description: Visualizes possibilities beyond constraints. Fuels visionary arcs; enables lateral solutions.

label: Observant
description: Attends to people and environments keenly. Enhances scouting, investigation, and social inference.

label: Self‑aware
description: Recognizes one’s own patterns and limits. Damps fatal flaws before escalation; deepens internal arcs.

label: Steadfast
description: Holds course under pressure. Stabilizes teams and sustains campaigns; risks rigidity when paired with pride.

label: Tactful
description: Speaks truth in ways others can hear. Empowers diplomacy and leadership; reduces reputational blowback.

label: Intuitive
description: Trusts pattern‑sense and gut. Useful when data is sparse; tension arises when it contradicts analysis.

label: Visionary
description: Sees trajectories and meaning others miss. Anchors movement‑building destinies; can clash with pragmatists.

label: Grounded
description: Keeps perspective amid hype or panic. Balances charismatic teammates; protects against reputation swings.

label: Sociable
description: Builds broad networks naturally. Unlocks resources and intel; increases exposure to exploitation and secrets.
